title: EYL #145 Usain Bolt on Building a Business Empire
itunes:title: EYL #145 Usain Bolt on Building a Business Empire
description:
The iconic Usain Bolt is the fastest person ever, arguably the greatest Olympian ever, and one of the greatest athletes ever. He revolutionized the sport of track and field during his illustrious career, winning eight gold medals, and holding the world record for the 100 meters and 200 meters. 


Although he’s a legend in sports, his career in the business world is just as impressive. He’s ranked as one of the highest paid athletes in the world from his many endorsement deals, he’s a restaurateur with a chain of Jamaican food restaurants named Tracks and Records, he’s an investor with several commercial buildings in Jamaica, and he’s a budding music mogul with plans of being the DJ Khaled of Dancehall. 


In episode 145, we sat down with Usain at his restaurant in Kingston, Jamaica to talk about all of his business ventures, his career, and the future of his beloved homeland of Jamaica. #UsainBolt #Jamaica #Olympics 


EYL University: https://www.eyluniversity.com


Link to Investfest: https://investfest.com/


Host IG: https://instagram.com/earnyourleisure?utm_medium=copy_link


Guest IG: https://instagram.com/usainbolt?utm_medium=copy_link

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
